military_tech.name: N-Way Fusion
military_tech.description: Previously thought a practical impossibility, recent advances in shielding technology permit more than two bodies to be involved in a fusion reaction. This opens up the door to enormous leaps in energy generation.

military_tech.name: Ubiquitous Surveillance
military_tech.description: Everyone's safer when nobody has any secrets, right? Every part of the world is awash with data capture devices from nano-cameras to eavesdropping files to chemical sniffers, not to mention digital trawlers.

military_tech.name: Unstable Isotope Machining
military_tech.description: High nuclear mass materials that have been artificially created are not necessarily stable. The technology to contain and exploit them has many practical, if violent, applications.
